summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 NISSAN SENTRA.  WHILE DRIVING 40 MPH ON A TWO LANE ROAD, THE CONTACT STRUCK ANOTHER VEHICLE ON THE PASSENGER SIDE.  HE SUSTAINED A SPRAINED NECK AND BRUISES, BUT THERE WERE NO SERIOUS INJURIES.  A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED.  THE AIR BAGS FAILED TO DEPLOY.  THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO A SERVICE SHOP.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT HE COULD HAVE BEEN SERIOUSLY INJURED DUE TO THE AIR BAGS NOT DEPLOYING IF THE CRASH HAD BEEN MORE SEVERE.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 6,166.
